english.segment1: Man of Sorrows! what a name. For the Son of God, who came. Ruined sinners to reclaim. Hallelujah! What a Savior!
english.segment2: Lifted up was He to die;. It is finished! was His cry;. Now in Heavn exalted high. Hallelujah! What a Savior!
english.segment3: Hallelujah.. Hallelujah.. Hallelujah.. What a Savior, yeah..
english.segment4: When He comes, our glorious King, All His ransomed home to bring, Then anew His song well sing: Hallelujah! What a Savior!
english.segment5: Hallelujah.. Hallelujah.. Hallelujah.. What a Savior.
